title: nAn unaik-kaNDu
sahitya:
nAnunaik-kaNDu kaLittEn jIva nAyakanE sukhadAyakanE


anupallavi

  vAnmukhil kaNDa mayilinaip-pOlaE vasanta malar kaNDa kuyilinam pOlE


caraNam    jnyAyirai-kaNDa tAmaraip-pOlE jnAniyaik-kaNDa jnAniyaip-pOlE
tAi varak-kaNDa sEyinaip-PolE tannaiyE kaNDa yOgiyaip-pOlE
